newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa Bond Exchange appoints Lawless new ceo.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa Bond Exchange appoints Lawless new ceo.

text.p: South Africa's Bond Exchange said on Monday that it had appointed Tom Lawless as its new chief executive officer from July 14.
Lawless is currently Treasury Manager of state-owned electricity concern Eskom.
Lawless has been a member of the exchange's executive committee since 1993, taking a leading role in its successful drive towards implementing electronic settlement.
He is also chairman of the Bond Issuers Association and represents bond issuers on the Financial Markets Advisory Board.
Lawless replaces Graham Lund, who resigned late last year after fulfilling his original mandate to establish a licenced exchange.
Lund left to join Mercantile Bank Ltd.
